name: The Child Of Slendrina
storyline:
Slendrina's baby has grown and has become as evil as her mother. So be extra careful when you are running around in the cellar corridors. You must also be prepared to meet Slendrinas father. If you see him then turn around as soon as possible!

Try to find 8 pieces of a key. Once you find all the pieces, you can open the safe which is in the cellar. Inside the safe there is a secret.

You also need, to find keys to open certain doors, and health injections that give you a little more health when you have been injured.
summary:
Slendrina is back in a new scary game!

The Child Of Slendrina is the sixth game in Slendrina Series. It gives Slendrina's Child and Slendrina's Father a role as an antagonist. It was released on April 1st, 2016, exclusive for Android devices only.
